title: Why Biologists Should Learn to Code?
description: Biology is continuously evolving and programming is not just for computer science students. Biologists can also learn it and get benefits of it , like big data summerization and analysis. So as far biology gets into experimental aspect of life it is essential for many biologists to get hands on practice thousands of tools developed in different programming languages like R , Python and Javascript.

sections.title: New Section
sections.content: Power Up Biology: Why and how Biologist can Learn and use Code?

sections.title: New Section
sections.content: Biology is continuously evolving field in case of research and data analysis. In this course we will analyse the data more practically and every little step. As per my whole career I always opted for advancement and more automation compared to larger amout of tools available on internet. In the last step we will discuss about how to make pipelines in programming to automate the data.

sections.title: New Section
sections.content: Power Up Your Biology: Why Every Biologist Should Learn to Code
